This is my story. It's uniquely mine‚Äîyet it is not unique.

name: Rep. Lucy McBath

When I finally got pregnant again, I was overjoyed. It was as if God had a plan for me. But, at four months, feeling terror and trauma in my heart, I was rushed to the emergency room.

There, with my doctor, I learned I had suffered a fetal demise.

name: Rep. Lucy McBath
tweet_text:
